attributes.action: Investigate the effect the current maternity rules is having on small businesses and their employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Small businesses employing a small number of people are in a lot of cases unable to maintain  production and turnover when a number of staff are absent due to long periods of maternity leave.
Business expenses ie: rent and rates are not reduced just because there is less staff and less turnover/profit.
Temporary staff are expensive and usually less efficient the usual outcome being that remaining staff have more pressure on them to maintain 'business as usual'.
A number of businesses are failing because of this burden forced on to them. 
Plus a number of businesses are also forced into closure due to unreasonable penalties imposed on them for not implimenting the rules.
How many business are lost and how many workers are loseing their jobs due to the closures brought about by these rules ?
